name: Cold Fire [Young Justice Dashboard Theme]
description: Blue/beige dashboard theme featuring Artemis and Kid Flash from Young Justice.
additional_info:
Graphics and coding by http://mocking-turtle.tumblr.com

If you find any problems, please contact me here or at my tumblr!

Also, don't forget to check out style 56372

-----

Update 11/27/11: background should now show up on all pages
Update 2/28/12: default Tumblr post icons should no longer show up in front of the custom one
Update 5/31/12: fixed like icon placement
Update 2/2/13: removed colored like/following icons, due to compatibility issues with recent updates
